long_description: The Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition earphones let you experience sound that will move you, along with a secure, comfortable and water-resistant fit. They're compatible with the iPod, iPad and iPhone. Patented twist lock technology locks Yurbuds securely into your ears and keeps them there through all kinds of intense physical movement. Ergonomic design employs medical-grade silicone to offer a soft, comfortable and personalized fit that avoids pressing on sensitive pain points. Clinically proven acoustics deliver deep, rich sound with all types of music, yet they allow sufficient ambient noise to keep you aware of your surroundings. Dry Mic 3-button control allows convenient navigation of music during rigorous activity as well as hands-free calls-even in the rain. Durable, sweatproof and water-resistant earphones deliver reliable performance in almost any conditions. The Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition earphones come with a zippered soft case.
short_description: The Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition earphones let you experience sound that will move you, along with a secure, comfortable and water-resistant fit. They're compatible with the iPod, iPad and iPhone.
